title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4251.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4251.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this rule is to facilitate the administration
of the Capital Access Program (the program) authorized by section 16-k of the

New York State Urban Development Corporation Act (the act). Pursuant to the
act, the corporation (hereinafter defined) may, within available
appropriations, assist small businesses, that otherwise find it difficult to
obtain regular or sufficient bank financing, through the funding of loan loss
reserves for loans made to such small businesses by participating financial
institutions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4251.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
